titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Naomi Allen Papers on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100 WAG.295

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-03 12:09:40 -0400.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.unittitle: Naomi Allen Papers on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records contain materials relating to Naomi Allen's involvement with the Local 100 of the Transport Workers Union of America in the 1990s.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Naomi Allen, 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 1985.005.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Naomi Allen was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Naomi Allen Paper on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100; WAG 295; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

controlaccess.corpname: Transport Workers Union of America. Local 100
